title: Most Likely a Slab Serif
author: dosenlunch

comments.content: Hard to say. Probably edited as some serifs look to have been removed (/p leg left, /i top and /r bottom left). [Typewriter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145606/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/typewriter) URW looks enough close to do the job but I really can't state if it'(was)s the one. Could even be bespoke. What's your sample origin?

hey ryuk. thanks for your reply. it is a logo of a friend of mine that i would like to use in one of a christmas present for him. so obviously i don't want to ask. i also have the impression that it is somehow edited...

typewriter might have been the original. i will give it try! thanks!

**[Klein Slabserif Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145606/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-4%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=KleinSlabserif-Light%20-%20Regular&fid=55c722792d4ec4bbb69d5042b3a34ae1&fsize=60&text=picture&wrap=2)** free font by Manfred Klein looks like an exact match
